headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: Amazon, NextEra, UnitedHealth, Nvidia
summary: ? Amazon.com (AMZN): The technology company plans to lay off as many as 30,000 employees starting as early as Tuesday. Amazon is due to post quarterly earnings on Thursday. ↘️ Whirlpool (WHR): The appliance maker's adjusted earnings per share topped expectations and its sales unexpectedly rose last quarter.
